participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Laid-back and creative, enjoys engaging in spontaneous activities. Prefers casual settings over formal.
participant_1.background: i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Marco
participant_2.personality: Passionate about food and culture, often seeks new experiences and loves to share stories.
participant_2.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i've a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year. i am an art major in college.
